gilbert.name: Gilbert

corpse.name: Human corpse
corpse.description: Somehow avoiding the corrupting influence of the Sludgeworks, this creature retained its humanity until the bitter end.

gilbert.description: This stout, red-haired man is clothed in brown leather armour covered in small pockets. He carries himself anxiously, constantly checking them for missing items, both real and imagined.

administrator.name: Administrator Hawise

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

administrator.description: A stern and imposing woman stands before you, clad in thick black leather armour. Her stance suggests military training, and only her piercing light blue eyes can be seen above a black bandana.

ozhol_prisoner.name: Strange Man

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

ozhol_prisoner.description: This intimidating man is being kept prisoner, bound with thick and iridescent metal chains to multiple points within the room. He stands motionless in the centre; his arms cannot be seen underneath his bizarrely creased blue fabric robes, neither can his face under his drooping wide-brimmed hat.

yttra.name: Yttra

corpse.name: Human corpse
corpse.description: Somehow avoiding the corrupting influence of the Sludgeworks, this creature retained its humanity until the bitter end.

yttra.description: Yttra appears weathered and is covered in scars from a hard life in the Midreach. She seems ever busy removing corrosion from her weapons and adjusting the straps on her many unusual pieces of clothing.

fedeman.name: Gilder Fedeman

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

fedeman.description: Surrounded by all manner of curios, unfamiliar devices and carefully-packaged wares, the Gilder gestures you to lay down your finds and barter. His demeanor is disarming and his dress unkempt, but a man in possession of such wealth must not be dismissed.

derwen.name: Old Derwen

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

derwen.description: He squats among the mounds of garbage, a friend to filth. Disgusting.
